info.title: Maytapi - WhatsApp API Documentation
info.description:
This API deals with a chatting platform based on WhatsApp. The user can send and receive text and media messages through WhatsApp in private chats with the endpoints that are created for the user. Moreover, the current status and the screen of the session can be retrieved using these endpoints. With the account specific endpoints, user can get the product or registered phones information, edit and remove these. **Example Projects:** [Maytapi WhatsApp Api NodeJS Example](https://github.com/Maytapi/whatsapp-api-nodejs-example) [Maytapi WhatsApp Api NodeJS Dialogflow Example](https://github.com/Maytapi/whatsapp-api-nodejs-dialogflow-example) [Maytapi WhatsApp Api Python Example](https://github.com/Maytapi/whatsapp-api-python-example) [Maytapi WhatsApp Api Python Dialogflow Example](https://github.com/Maytapi/whatsapp-api-python-dialogflow-example) You need to send **'x-maytapi-key':'YOUR_TOKEN'** header with every request. You can find your **product_id** and **token** at [https://console.maytapi.com/settings/token](https://console.maytapi.com/settings/token) You can find **message examples** in /sendMessage documentation section [Screenshot](https://maytapi.com/images/sendmessage.png) | Feature | Status| Description | |:-------------------------|:-----------:|--------------------------------| | Receive message | ‚úÖ | You need to set your webhook with **/setWebhook** endpoint. | | Receive media | ‚úÖ | Image, Video, Docs/File, Audio, Location, vCard supported. | | Send Text Message | ‚úÖ | Send message works with queue. Message id and success response states that message added to sending queue.
If your messages isn't sended check your instance status for connection/login problems.
You can also check **/logs** endpoint or [Developer Logs Page](https://console.maytapi.com/developers/logs) for error messages if you are using wrong format you can find the error in here.
You can also check your queue status in [Developer Webhook Page](https://console.maytapi.com/developers/webhook) or with **/{phone_id}/queue** endpoint./ | | Send Media | ‚úÖ | Image, Audio(ogg-file in opus codec), Video, Docs(pdf,docx,etc.) supported. | | Send vCard | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí vCard Message | | Send Contact | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Contact Message | | Send Location | ‚úÖ |You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Location Message | | Send Procuct | ‚úÖ |You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Product Message (**BETA**)
You need to create products from WhatsApp Business Phone App.
You can find Product Ids from new **/catalog** endpoint. | | Forward Messages | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Forward Message | | Reply to Messages | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Reply Message | | Delete Messages | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Delete Message | | Reaction Message |‚úÖ| You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Reaction Message | | Edit Message |‚úÖ| You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Edit Message | |Create Groups | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in **/{phone_id}/createGroup** | | Get groups | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in **/{phone_id}/getGroups** | Mention Message for Groups | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in /sendMessage ‚Üí Examples ‚Üí Group Mention Message | | Leave Group | ‚úÖ | You can find the example in **/leaveGroup** | | New Spam Filter | ‚úÖ | We added a new spam/dupe filter for recurring messages in the same conversation. In a conversation, the last 3 unique messages can't be sent more than 3 times.
This feature is to ignore spam messages sent to the same user. Sending same message to different users is not filtered.
You can also ignore the filter by adding `"skip_filter":true` to messages. You can find an example for this in /sendMessage examples section. | | Listen to Read Receipts | ‚úÖ | You need to enable this with **/setAckPreference** endpoint. | | Webhook examples. | ‚úÖ | You can find webhook examples in **Callbacks** tab of **/setWebhook** endpoint definition. |

product_id.description: You can find your token at https://console.maytapi.com/settings/token

get.description: Returns the information of the product with the given product id.
Returns information of all the phones registered to the given product.
Returns information of all the phones registered to the given product with queue information.

post.description: Sets a webhook address for the selected product. Webhook is used for delivering the incoming messages and acknowledge notifications of sent messages to the user. The notification formats that reaches to the webhook are as follows:
All the incoming messages from the active session are delivered here with the format given in the responses part.

200.description: Your server returns this code if it accepts the callback

post.description:
All the acknowledge notifications of the sent messages from the active session are delivered here with the format given in the responses part.

| ackCode | ackType | Description |
|-|---------|------------------------------------------|
| 1 | delivered | Delivered to whatsapp servers. |
| 2 | reached | Message reached to user. |
| 3 | seen | Message seen by user. |
| 4 | played | Message played by user. (sound messages) |
| 5 | deleted | Message deleted by user. |

200.description: Your server returns this code if it accepts the callback

post.description:
All the status change are delivered to your webhook with the format given in the request part.

Status code meanings:
- active: Working phone state.
- qr-code: On qr-code login screen state.
- idle: When a phone stays at qr-code for 3 min. it turns to idle state.
- phone-error: Phone is not connected or battery low like whatsapp warning states.

200.description: Your server returns this code if it accepts the callback

post.description: These events only occur when using api and livechat together.

200.description: Your server returns this code if it accepts the callback
Returns the information of updated selected product.

post.description: Adds a new phone to the product.

requestBody.description: If a number is wanted to be specified by adding the phone, that number is given. Otherwise, the number will be updated in database, when qr-screen is passed later.

post.description: Sets the option for getting the acknowledge messages from the webhook to true or false.

requestBody.description: Acknowledge messages taking preference is indicated.

200.description: Returns the information of updated selected product.

get.description: Returns logs of all the phones.
Returns the status of the current session.

200.description: Returns the screenshot of the screen in the current session.

get.description: Returns the screenshot of the screen in the current session.
Returns the queue info of the phone.

200.description: Returns the queue info of the phone.

get.description: Clears phone's send message queue.

200.description: Clears phone's send message queue.

get.description: Returns the qrCode in the current session if there is one.

200.description: Returns the screenshot of the qr code in the current session.

get.description: Returns the contacts in the current whatsapp instance.

200.description: Returns the contacts in the current whatsapp instance.

get.description: Returns the information of the number you specified in Whatsapp

200.description: Returns the information of the number you specified in Whatsapp

get.description: Redeploys docker instance of your phone. If your phone having any unexpected problems you can use this endpoint to reboot the instance.

Factory resets everything about phone instance to a new created instance state. This is a replacement for delete/create a new phone. 

Your phone instances can't be deleted anymore. This is implemented beacuse some of our customers were loosing their phone instance when their subscription(or trial) suspended. With the new system your phones would only set to disabled state and after you fix your subscription you can re-enable your phones either making a request(/screen etc.) to instance or from our control panel.
Logouts the number from the current session and converts the screen to qr-code screen.
Get phone specifig config for webhook and ack_delivery. If empty product webhook config would be used for delivery.

post.description:
Set phone specifig config for webhook and ack_delivery. If empty product webhook config would be used for delivery.

With this api you can define webhook for individual phones.

requestBody.description: With this api you can define webhook for individual phones.

get.description: **[DEPRECATED please use /factoryreset]** Deletes the phone and closes the session of that number.
**[DEPRECATED please use /redeploy]** Restarts the session by refreshing the page.

get.summary: DEPRECATED Multi-Device doesn't support this feature.
get.description: **[DEPRECATED Multi-Device doesn't support this feature]** Backups the material needed for opening the same chat screen for the current phone number. This call is useful when the session and also the status of the session is active. The response information can be used to open the chat screen with the POST restore call. If logout is called after getting the backup information, the data obtained from there will not be valid anymore.

post.summary: DEPRECATED Multi-Device doesn't support this feature.
post.description: **[DEPRECATED Multi-Device doesn't support this feature]** Reloads the current session based on the reload data (can be obtained from ***POST backup***).

requestBody.description: All the session restoring data needed.

post.description:
Used for sending message to a chat. A text, image, video, sound and document can be sent.

**This endpoint adds messages to your phone's sending queue. If your messages not delivering to phones please check your instance logs, queue endpoint or connection (/screen).**

**Curl example:** (You need to change product_id, phone_id and token[x-maytapi-key] with your product's values...)
```bash
curl -X POST \
'https://api.maytapi.com/api/dc01968f-####-####-####-7cfcf51aa423/12/sendMessage' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'x-maytapi-key: b267697c-####-####-####-2435e812efc1' \
  -d '{
	"message": "http://placehold.it/180", 
	"text": "", 
	"to_number": "+905301111111", 
	"type": "media"
}'

requestBody.description:
- to_number should start with country code without any special characters.
- For group conversations you need to pass group.id to to_number. Ex: **"905301234567-1574073754@g.us"**
- If the message to be sent is just a text message, it can be put directly to ***message*** parameter in the body 
- **For media and group message examples please look at 'Request body examples' section below.**
- For Product messages you need to create your products from WhatsApp Business Phone app and find your product id with **/catalog** endpoints.

value.message: You can use ascii emojis üòÄ in your text üìù messages.
You can add skip_filter: true in messages to skip dupe filter.
Just put the number after a at symbol. Example: @905301234567 You can use multiple number.

message.vcard:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
FN;CHARSET=UTF-8:John Doe
N;CHARSET=UTF-8:;John;Doe;;
TEL;TYPE=CELL:+9051234567
REV:2020-01-23T11:09:14.782Z
END:VCARD

200.description: Returns the id of the chat and the id of the message. You can use message id to track acknowledgement status.

get.description: Get conversations list.

parameters.name: full
parameters.description: Load participants for old conversations. (Max response limit:100)

parameters.name: invite
parameters.description: Include invite links for groups. (Max response limit:50)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Paging for groups. We suggest to use with **sort** option.

200.description: Returns the information of updated selected product.

get.description: Get a conversation info.

200.description: Returns the information of updated selected product.

post.description:
Change profile picture of a group conversation or yourself.

To change profile picture of yourself you need to leave the conversation_id blank.

You need to use square images for better view. We suggest 512x512 images.

requestBody.description: Group conversation id and number is required for the actions.

200.description: Returns the success information about the action.

post.description:
Change config of a group conversation.

To learn conversation_id you can use /getGroups endpoint.

You can change who can edit group info(edit), can send message(send) and disappearing messages enabled(disappear).

For edit and send config you can use values "admins" or "all".

Disappear only accepts true/false values.

Config values are optional. If you want to only change a config you should only use that config's key in request body.

requestBody.description: Group conversation id and number is required for the actions.

200.description: Returns the success information about the action.

post.description:
Add a participant to a group conversation.

To learn conversation_id you can use /getGroups endpoint.

requestBody.description: Group conversation id and number is required for the actions.

200.description: Returns the success information about the action.

To learn conversation_id you can use /getGroups endpoint.

200.description: Returns the success information about the action.

post.description: You can leave the group you want with the help of this endpoint.
